description: Source code for a registration screen in a Flutter mobile application, implementing user registration UI with form validation, navigation, and state management via Provider.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the registration screen for new users.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the registration form, input controllers, form validation, and navigation logic.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes input controllers when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _register
methods.description: Performs user registration by validating form inputs and invoking the AuthState.register method.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the registration screen, including form fields, validation, and navigation upon success.
